name: Star Feast
description:
Star Feast has you as a cute, pink creature hurtling through space eating stars.

I tried to incorporate both themes of "Growing" and "Two Button Controls" into the game. I really enjoyed making this.

Let me know what you think! All criticism is welcome. Please bear in mind that I was only able to work on it one full day out of the three.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=60551

Follow me on twitter: @dansereau_simon

Follow the artist on tumblr: http://twokoos.tumblr.com

Thanks for playing!
